p: Although it is essential through multidisciplinary research to establish practical methods for large-scale disinfection treatment to inactivateÂ SARS-CoV-2 in different environmental settings in order to reduce the risk of infection, this does not stop the pandemic. Unlike multidisciplinary research, where researchers from disparate fields work either separately or in collaboration, interdisciplinary research refers to teams with varying specialties unifying to achieve an overall objective [ 13, 16, 17].
